siteMetadata.name: Gerard Slee
siteMetadata.title: Gerard Slee | Architect, Unity C# and Shader Developer
siteMetadata.description: Architect turned VR Developer in Cape Town.
siteMetadata.about:
I am an Architect turned VR Developer with experience in design and development of Unity based VR applications for startups and
    large companies. I have 5+ years experience running a indie team of developers. and 6+ developing with C# and shaders in Unity. 
    For the last two years I have been doing freelance AR and VR development, building a prototype VR DJ Experience for a startup to generate funding, and research and development of a realtime Global Illumination project for Unity using Compute Shaders.
    Before that I spent a few years running a bootstrapped virtual reality start-up developing games and software for architects and engineers. I love integrating new technologies and optimizing workflows and have an ability to inspire those around me. I am looking to work
with people who want to drive change and alter the digital landscape and make awesome games.
siteMetadata.author: @GerardSlee
